/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The roads are filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and brown, reflecting the urban environment. The perspective from above gives a comprehensive view of the city's layout and the movement of its inhabitants.
